item.description:
Here ye Here ye!

To all Schiffheads in Connecticut- This is your chance to make a real Schifference!

WE NEED YOUR HELP AT THE STATE CONVENTION! We need as many Schiff supporters as possible to show up in Hartford and show off Peter's loyal fan base.

We're going to be hosting a phone bank in our ballroom at the convention center, and need to fill the room with volunteers, calling up Republicans in the state, urging them to vote for Peter in the primary.

A rally will take place as well...Our whole crew will be outside the center, with signs, flags, and special Schiff uniforms (which will be available to buy)

If you love Peter Schiff and want to back him up...PLEASE COME TO HARTFORD NEXT FRIDAY!
This day will be a whole lot of fun! smile
item.name: State Covention Schiff Happens Rally & Phone Banking
